Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a go-ahead three-run homer
Starling Marte added a single to make it 4-2
Pre-Game Insights: The Mets trailed 2-0 in the top of the ninth inning
Francisco Lindor hit a two-run home run earlier in the series to clinch a postseason spot
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets are the first team in MLB history to clinch a postseason spot in a win and win a playoff series BOTH via games in which they faced a deficit in the 9th inning or later
New York hasn't made the World Series since 2015, which they lost to Kansas City
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets were 24-35 at one point this season but put together a fantastic final 90 games or so in order to make the postseason
